channel.title: Daily AI News

item.title: Accelerating life sciences research
item.description: Discover how a specialized AI model, GPT-4b micro, helped OpenAI and Retro Bio engineer more effective proteins for stem cell therapy and longevity research....

item.title: Scaling domain expertise in complex, regulated domains
item.description: Discover how Blue J is transforming tax research with AI-powered tools built on GPT-4.1. By combining domain expertise with Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Blue J delivers fast, accurate, and fully-cited tax answers—trusted by professionals across the US, Canada, and the UK....

item.title: Mixi reimagines communication with ChatGPT

item.title: OpenAI’s letter to Governor Newsom on harmonized regulation
item.description: We’ve just sent a letter to Gov. Gavin Newsom calling for California to lead the way in harmonizing state-based AI regulation with national—and, by virtue of US leadership, emerging global—standards....

item.title: Introducing Gemma 3 270M: The compact model for hyper-efficient AI
item.description: Today, we're adding a new, highly specialized tool to the Gemma 3 toolkit: Gemma 3 270M, a compact, 270-million parameter model....

item.title: How AI is helping advance the science of bioacoustics to save endangered species

item.title: Genie 3: A new frontier for world models
item.description: Genie 3 can generate dynamic worlds that you can navigate in real time at 24 frames per second, retaining consistency for a few minutes at a resolution of 720p....

item.title: Rethinking how we measure AI intelligence
item.description: Game Arena is a new, open-source platform for rigorous evaluation of AI models. It allows for head-to-head comparison of frontier systems in environments with clear winning conditions....
